entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] Windows test failures - `PrecompiledRegex_*` in `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #65978
  • Assertion failed 'schema.size() > 0' during 'Profile instrumentation' #65977
  • Segmentation fault while running "dotnet build" #65976
  • Intermittent EF Core/Azure SQL Connection Issues #65975
  • [API Proposal]: Add ObsoleteAttribute.BinaryCompatOnly #65965
  • [Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting] BackgroundService ExecuteAsync can prevent app from stopping #65964
  • [wasm] Build libclang in dotnet/llvm-project for arm arch #65961
    7.0.0
  • [DebuggerDisplay] for JsonTypeInfo does not render #65960
    7.0.0
  • [Android][x86] Build failed: Opcode r4_add/r4_conv_to_r8 missing from machine description file. #65958
  • [WASM] Wasm.Build.Tests run with `EMSDK` - `clang` failing to load `libLLVM-13git.so` #65956
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStreamReadTests.TestAsyncErrorStream_SynchronizingObject test failed #65955
  • System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.CooperativeBlockingCanCreateThreadsFaster test failed #65954
  • [FileStream] Multiple FileShare are not working in FileStream #65953
  • Locking StreamReader processes on EndOfStream #65952
  • [API Proposal]: APIs to support tar archives #65951
  • [API Proposal]: Add a fast Norm() or IsCloseTo(double tolerance) Function to `INumber<TSelf>` #65950
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\localloc\\call\\call07_small\\call07_small.cmd #65943
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\StructABI\\structreturn\\structreturn.cmd #65942
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\Bytemark\\Bytemark\\Bytemark.cmd #65940

Closed

  • Default to IsDevelopment in common development scenarios #65689
    Future
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GC\\GetTotalAllocatedBytes\\GetTotalAllocatedBytes.cmd #65941
  • [API Proposal]: Marshal.GetFunctionPointerForDelegate() consistent with delegate* #65853
  • [WASM] Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/class-accessors.c:89, condition `<disabled>' not met #65957
  • Parallel.ForEachAsync and propagation of endogenous cancellation errors #65963
  • GCStandAlone Linux arm64 - largearraytest/largearraytest.sh [FAIL] #62084
  • GCStandAlone Windows arm64 - test HeapExpansion\plug\plug.cmd [FAIL] #62083
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\suppressfinalize\\suppressfinalize.cmd #63658
  • WriteDump failed of dotnet-dump net 6 single file #65347
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/DoublinkList/dlbigleakthd_v2/dlbigleakthd_v2.sh #63981
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\BenchmarksGame\\regex-redux\\regex-redux-5\\regex-redux-5.cmd #62174
  • [Tests] System.Text.RegularExpressions System.InvalidProgramException : Common Language Runtime detected an invalid program #65278
    7.0.0
  • Path.GetFullPath has different behavior on macOS and Linux when passed a string of whitespace #65683
    7.0.0
  • .NET Core application fails to find CA cert on Linux even after putting the certificates in ca cert store of openssl #65851
  • Why doesn't PriorityQueue have the Remove(TElement element) method #65928
  • interface like mono_domain_create_appdomain is declared but there is no implemention. #63494
    7.0.0
  • Support for tar archives #1540
    7.0.0
  • BadImageFormatException when calling both C++\CLI on .NET FW 4.8 and C++\CLI on .NET 5 from same C++ project #65604
  • Review skipped test case for regex scanner with \c[ pattern #65931
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Release/6.0] Backport of Mariner 2.0 and Linux Arm64 packaging work #65979
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-installer, 6.0.x
  • [hot_reload] various post-Preview 1 fixes #65973
    area-EnC-mono
  • [TEST ONLY] trying to repro a bug #65972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix DebuggerDisplay for serializer types #65971
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [mono] Remove support for nint/nuint/nfloat from mini-native-types.c #65967
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Remove pinning from number formatting in corelib #65962
    area-System.Runtime
  • Mark ImageAnimator.UpdateFrames to accept a nullable Image #65949
    area-System.Drawing, 7.0.0
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Update the StubManager for better debugger stepping. #65947
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Convert* for Vector{64, 128} on ARM64 #65946
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

Merged

  • [PERF][MAUI] Add Maui version info to stored data. Runtime Side #65800
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-preview2] Remove usages of native bootstrapping #65974
  • Add regex "unit tests" test project #65944
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix minor random bias #65404
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Make Is*Project properties unambiguous and improve IsGeneratorProject detection #65896
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Update WASI-enabled runtime to support running ASP.NET Core #65888
    area-Build-mono
  • Update GenAPI usage and code clean-up #65887
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update stale comments that reference GitHub issues #65932
    area-Meta, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Add AssemblyName overload for ILVerify.IResolver.Resolve method #65905
    area-ILVerification
  • null-check the redirect context before using. #65910
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Native aot trim annotations experiment #65816
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Do not value number locals on the LHS #65902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix libraries GCStress pipeline #65924
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Bump sdk for workload testing to `7.0.100-preview.2.22108.4` #65003
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Keep Obsolete and EditorBrowsable attributes consistent between ref and src and DefineConst clean-up #65847
    area-Meta, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Make ObjectConverter use ConverterStrategy.Object #65748
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix GC hole with multi-reg local var stores #65916
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add HostApplicationBuilder #65109
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Fix remaining COM warnings in crossgen2 #65297
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Repair inconsistent nullability nullability on TypeConverter (#63186) #63874
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-preview2][mono][hot reload] Fix sequence point logic for compiler-generated methods in updates #65867
    area-EnC-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix cancellation race condition in PipeStream cancellation callback #65909
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Remove redundant allocations from JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverter calls #65898
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Update Roslyn and use new step tracking API in incremental tests. #63978
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Disable default marshalling for bool #65749
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Make DllImportGenerator emit a GeneratedCodeAttribute on our stubs #65868
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [Draft]Use ValueStringBuilder in Encode/DecodeName #65893
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • add missing GC.SuppressFinalize(this) to FileStream.DisposeAsync #65899
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable generating SIMD intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector on Arm64 #65486
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use generic `Enum` methods when possible. #64850
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Improved error handling in debug proxy #65828
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • retire DummyTcpServer from SslStream tests #65876
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
  • [wasm][debugger] Support "on frame evaluation" of functions returning char #65842
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
